<title> Moritz Schwarz | PhD Candidate | University of Vienna | I am a PhD candidate in Economics at the University of Vienna. My research interests include Empirical Industrial Organization and Competition Economics. </title>

# About
I am a PhD candidate in Economics at the [University of Vienna](https://econ.univie.ac.at/). Currently, I am working on [projects](https://www.moritz-schwarz.com/research/) related to demand estimation, behavioral biases, and collusive pricing. Previously, I worked for 3 years as a competition economist in the public and private sectors -- CV [here](https://www.moritz-schwarz.com/cv/).

You can meet me at the workshop of the [research group](https://www.dice.hhu.de/en/news-1/millionenfoerderung-der-dfg-und-des-oesterreichischen-fwf-fuer-das-projekt-consumer-preferences-consumer-mistakes-and-forms-response-mit-sprecher-paul-heidhues-dice-hhu)  *"Consumer Preferences, Consumer Mistakes, and Firms’ Response"* at DICE, Düsseldorf during 5--7 Sept 2023.

## Research Interests
Empirical Industrial Organization

Competition Economics
